content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) extracting coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-83.5) waiting for source items, transferring coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=40.5, y=-83.5) and (x=42.5, y=-83.5) for coal storage.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5) transferring coal to another location.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-79.5) storing coal.

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=2.0, y=0.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.

### Coal Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with inputs from Belt at position (x=42.5, y=-83.5) to (x=44.5, y=-83.5) and outputs from Belt at position (x=43.5, y=-83.5) to (x=45.5, y=-83.5), transporting coal.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Check the inventory of the source entity and ensure it is not empty.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
